metadata.name: Ephedrine Hydrochloride 3 mg ml solution for injection in pre filled syringe
metadata.composition: Each ml of Solution for Injection contains 3 mg ephedrine hydrochloride corresponding to 2 46 mg ephedrine Each 10 ml pre filled syringe contains 30 mg ephedrine hydrochloride corresponding to 24 6 mg ephedrine

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Treatment of hypotension from spinal or epidural anaesthesia

contraindications.disease: Ephedrine should not be used in case of
contraindications.excipients: Sodium chloride;Citric acid monohydrate;Sodium citrate;Hydrochloric acid (for pH adjustment);Sodium hydroxide (for pH adjustment);Water for injections
contraindications.incompatibilities: In the absence of compatibility studies, this medicinal product must not be mixed with other medicinal products.
